title: Just updated to Android 12 Beta 1. System still shows Android 11.
content:
After seeing Google I/O today, I cannot get the main screen to look the same as shown (not a huge issue!) Does anyone know where to get the wallpaper and icons from?
When my phone went into sleep mode (blank screen) I had to reboot it as it would not come back on again .. (the upgrade went well, but it still says Android 11)
Thinking that maybe a system firmware reboot might be the next step if things keep messing up??
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
